mapper.select: select item_id, name, itemQuantity, price from item
mapper.insert: insert into orders (email, address, zip_code, password) values (#{email}, #{address}, #{zip_code}, PASSWORD(#{password}));
insert into orderItem (order_id, item_id, orderCount, orderPrice) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{item_id}, #{orderCount}, #{orderPrice});
mapper.select: select item_id, name, itemQuantity, price from item order by item_id desc
select item_id, name, itemQuantity, price from item order by item_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select order_id, email, address, order_date, orderStatus, zip_code from orders where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.orderStatus, o.zip_code, o.address, oi.order_item_id, oi.item_id, oi.orderCount, oi.orderPrice, i.name FROM orders o JOIN orderItem oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN item i ON oi.item_id = i.item_id WHERE o.email=#{email}
